#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int Near( int n ) {

	int sum = 1;

	while( sum <= n ) {
		sum = sum << 1;
	}

	sum = sum >> 1;

	return sum;

}

int main( ) {
	
	int t, i, sum, n, v;

	scanf("%d", &t );

	while( t-- ) {

		string s;
		cin >> s;

		n = s.length();

		for( i = 0, sum = 0;i < n;i++ )
			sum += s[ i ];

		v = Near( sum );

		printf("%d\n", sum - v );
	}

	return 0;
}
